page.title: 19CHURCH AND COMMUNITY
page.content: Approximately one third of our area is in the Parish of{St.John the {Baptist Church}(Church of England) sited in Oakfield, Ryde. The church holds{Holy Communion, {Parish Communion}and{Evening Service every Sunday with{Junior Church}once a month. At Easter about 200 parishoners attend Communion. There are{weekday {services}including Communion held at 3 Old Peoples' Homes. Brownies, Guides, Cubs and Scouts attend{Church Parades}monthly. Church members hold regular{Bible {Study meetings}and{Prayer meetings}for healing and missionary work.{Visits are organised to homes where comfort due to sickness or berievement is needed. Links are made with the community through a{"Good Neighbour's" {Scheme}and through strong links to the local church schools.
